hibernate-mapping.query: select count(cheque.ChequeBookNo) from PFMORM00006 as cheque where cheque.AccountNo = :accountNo and cheque.ChequeBookNo = :chequeBookNo and cheque.SourceBranchCode = :branchCode and :startNo between cheque.StartNo and cheque.EndNo and :endNo between cheque.StartNo and cheque.EndNo and cheque.CurrencyCode= :currency and cheque.Active = true

select count(cheque.ChequeBookNo) from PFMORM00006 as cheque where cheque.AccountNo = :accountNo and :chequeNo between cheque.StartNo and cheque.EndNo and cheque.SourceBranchCode = :branchCode and cheque.Active = true

select new chequedto ( cheque.AccountNo, cheque.ChequeBookNo, cheque.StartNo, cheque.EndNo ) from PFMORM00006 as cheque where cheque.AccountNo = :accountNo and cheque.ChequeBookNo = :chequeBookNo and :chequeNo between cheque.StartNo and cheque.EndNo and cheque.SourceBranchCode = :branchCode and cheque.Active = true

select new chequedto ( cheque.AccountNo, cheque.ChequeBookNo, cheque.StartNo, cheque.EndNo ) from PFMORM00006 as cheque where cheque.AccountNo = :accountNo and :chequeNo between cheque.StartNo and cheque.EndNo and cheque.SourceBranchCode = :branchCode and cheque.Active = true

select new chequedto ( cheque.AccountNo, cheque.ChequeBookNo, cheque.StartNo, cheque.EndNo ) from PFMORM00006 as cheque where cheque.AccountNo = :accountNo and cheque.ChequeBookNo = :chequeBookNo and :chequeNo between cheque.StartNo and cheque.EndNo and cheque.SourceBranchCode = :branchCode and cheque.Active = true

select count(cheque.ChequeBookNo) from PFMORM00006 as cheque where (cheque.ChequeBookNo = :chequeBookNo and :startNo between cheque.StartNo and cheque.EndNo and :endNo between cheque.StartNo and cheque.EndNo) and cheque.SourceBranchCode = :branchCode and cheque.CurrencyCode = :currency and cheque.Active = true

select count(cheque.ChequeBookNo) from PFMORM00006 as cheque where cheque.ChequeBookNo = :chequeBookNo and cheque.SourceBranchCode = :branchCode and cheque.CurrencyCode = :currency and cheque.Active = true
select new chequedto ( cq.StartNo, cq.EndNo ) from PFMORM00006 as cq where cq.AccountNo = :accountNo and cq.Active = true
select new chequedto ( cq.ChequeBookNo, cq.StartNo, cq.EndNo ) from PFMORM00006 as cq where cq.AccountNo = :accountNo and cq.Active = true
update PFMORM00006 as cheque set cheque.CloseDate = :closeDate, cheque.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, cheque.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where cheque.AccountNo = :accountNo and cheque.Active = true

select new chequedto(cheque.AccountNo,cheque.ChequeBookNo,cheque.StartNo,cheque.EndNo,cheque.CurrencyCode) from PFMORM00006 as cheque where cheque.AccountNo = :accountNo and cheque.ChequeBookNo = :chequeBookNo and cheque.Active = true

select new chequedto ( cq.AccountNo, cq.IssueDate, cq.ChequeBookNo, cq.StartNo, cq.EndNo, cq.CloseDate, cq.Active ) from PFMORM00006 as cq where cq.ChequeBookNo = :chequebookno and cq.SourceBranchCode = :branchCode and cq.Active=true

update PFMORM00006 cheque set cheque.ChequeBookNo = :chequebookno, cheque.StartNo = :startno, cheque.EndNo = :endno, cheque.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, cheque.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where cheque.ChequeBookNo = :chequebookno and cheque.Active = true and cheque.SourceBranchCode=:sourcebr

select new chequedto ( cq.AccountNo, cq.IssueDate, cq.ChequeBookNo, cq.StartNo, cq.EndNo, cq.Active ) from PFMORM00006 as cq where convert(char(10),cq.IssueDate,111) between convert(char(10),:startDate,111) and convert(char(10),:endDate,111) and cq.SourceBranchCode = :branch and cq.Active=true order by cq.IssueDate

select new chequedto ( cq.AccountNo, cq.IssueDate, cq.ChequeBookNo, cq.StartNo, cq.EndNo, cq.Active ) from PFMORM00006 as cq where cq.AccountNo=:accountNo and cq.SourceBranchCode = :branch and cq.Active=true order by cq.IssueDate
